title: "ur the guys that ruin our game riot pls ban"
body:
Friend and I did Rek'Sion bot lane. We STOMPED the entire enemy team HARD. I, Rek, ended up being able to go 3v1, and the Udyr was SO MAD. The quote in the title is from the Udyr.

Someone please tell me, is doing well bannable? I was chat restricted so I couldn't say anything in [All] chat. Obviously the worst BMing I could do is spamming laugh. 

http://imgur.com/dlN5SZO

Udyr was raging for the latter half of the game, and reported me afterwards.
